Package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.settingsconversion

package org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog.settingsconversion
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.defaultdialog
    This package offers a default implementation of a Node Dialog as described in org.knime.core.webui.node.dialog.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    DefaultNodeSettingsClassToNodeSettings
    This class is used to construct new NodeSettings to initialize them.
    JsonDataToNodeSettings
    Used to de-serialize JSON data to DefaultNodeSettings to be further transformed to NodeSettings.
    NodeSettingsToJsonFormsSettings
    This class can be used to transform NodeSettings first to DefaultNodeSettings and then further to JsonFormsSettings.
    TextToJsonUtil
    Used to transform string parameters from the front-end to JSON in a consistent way
    VariableSettingsUtil
    Utilities around VariableSettingsRO and VariableSettingsWO.
